#GÃ¶zlem islemleri : filter()

```{r}
library(nycflights13)
library(magrittr) # needs to be run every time you start R and want to use %>%
library(dplyr)   
df <- flights
df

```


```{r}
filter(df,day == 1)

filter(df,dep_time > 517)

filter(df,day == 2,dep_time > 520)

```

```{r}
a <- filter(df,dep_delay > mean(dep_delay,na.rm = TRUE))
b <- select(a,carrier,dep_delay)

arrange(b,desc(dep_delay))
```
```{r}

sample_n(df,10)  #Selects randomly observation

head(df,10) #Select First 10

top_n(df,10)  #Selects First 10 

slice(df,100:110)  #Selects between 100-110

```
